keyMoments.title: Mr. 3 and Miss Goldenweek Receive Orders
keyMoments.description: Baroque Works agents Mr. 3 and Miss Goldenweek receive new orders while on vacation at Kyuka Island, though Miss Goldenweek delayed sharing them for several days.
keyMoments.significance: Shows how Baroque Works communicates with and deploys its agents, while revealing the organization provides vacation time.

reveals.information: Mr. 3 and Miss Goldenweek are revealed as Officer Agents of Baroque Works
Baroque Works provides structured vacation time at designated locations like Kyuka Island
Agents receive orders via transponder snail even while on vacation
